Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

notFound.title: Page could not be found
notFound.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're after! Try starting again from the homepage.

internalServerError.title: Internal Server Error
internalServerError.description: This page has thrown a non-recoverable error.

sign_in.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

sign_up.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

forgot_password.meta_description: Reset your password easily with our secure password recovery process.

reset_password.meta_description: Set a new password securely with our password reset feature.

account.meta_description: Manage your account settings and preferences in one convenient place.
